alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 4:24AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing snow at the rate of 1 to 3 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 420 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was moving slowly south and intensifying across northern Jefferson County. It will continue to expand southward affecting Northern Lewis County by 6 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Carthage, West Carthage, Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Henderson Harbor, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Adams Center, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville and Philadelphia. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 43 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Travel is difficult if not impossible due to recent blizzard conditions. Observe all existing travel bans. &&
